## ERC20.on() method

Listen for contract events

 The function is calling `WatchContractEvent` witch will attempt to create an Event Filter and listen to changes to the Filter per polling interval, however, if the RPC Provider does not support Filters this function will not work

**Signature:**

```typescript
on<T extends keyof IERC20Events>(eventName: T, callback: IERC20Events[T]): import("viem").WatchContractEventReturnType;
```

</td><td>

T


</td><td>

the name of the event


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

callback


</td><td>

IERC20Events\[T\]


</td><td>

the function to call when the event is triggered


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

import("viem").WatchContractEventReturnType
